mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.PatentID , a.PatentCode , a.PatentName , a.PatentType , a.ApplyYear , a.PassTime , a.PatentPerson , a.OurUnitOrder , a.ProjectID , a.TeamID , a.Memo , a.CreateUserID , a.CreateTime , a.Status , b.ProjectName AS ProjectIDLinkText , c.TeamName AS teamname , t10.real_name AS CreateUserIDLinkText , t12.dict_label AS StatusLinkText , bs.dict_sort AS FixParamOrderNum FROM ACH_Patent a JOIN sys_user t10 ON t10.user_id = a.CreateUserID JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = '科技成果状态' ) t12 ON t12.dict_value = a.Status JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = '专利类型' ) bs ON bs.dict_label = a.PatentType LEFT JOIN Aud_Project b ON a.ProjectID = b.ProjectID LEFT JOIN PM_Team c ON a.TeamID = c.TeamID ) v1
